name: Nightwalk Simulator
storyline:
In the spine-chilling world of Nightwalk Simulator, every shadow conceals a new terror, and every decision could be your last. You're transported to a nightmarish reality in 1985, where your intellect and will to survive are put to the ultimate test.

Armed with just a flashlight, a pistol, and your wits, you'll traverse a chilling landscape. Carefully solving puzzles and plotting your routes are essential to survive this foreboding nightmare. In this AAAAAA mock-sim experience, you'll need to manage your flashlight’s limited battery life, as the darkness is nearly impenetrable without it.
summary: Nightwalk Simulator is a compelling puzzle game that tests your intellect with intricate and varied challenges requiring keen problem-solving skills. There is no traditional narrative, but the world and its mysteries are connected to the storyline of the parent game, The Vision. Set in 1985, your goal is to escape the horrific alternate reality you've been transported to. The game features a large, randomized map with unique puzzles in each playthrough, providing varied experiences. You'll need to solve complex puzzles, manage your flashlight’s battery, and conserve your sidearm ammo. Although the world appears normal at night, beware of zombies and aliens lurking around. Light plays a crucial role in your survival. Using the various street lamps, which are also randomized in their locations, is crucial to conserving battery life and seeing where you aim.
